CustomField.description: Optional. A list of carbon copy (CC) addresses or object IDs of the contacts, leads, and users you’re sending the email to. The maximum allowed is 25.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional. A list of carbon copy (CC) addresses or object IDs of the contacts, leads, and users you’re sending the email to. The maximum allowed is 25.
CustomField.label: CcAddresses
